channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FEMA promised funds to tsunami-proof an Oregon hospital. That money is MIA
item.description: The federal government promised an Oregon hospital millions of dollars to help prepare for an earthquake. They're still waiting for the money.

item.title: Prosecutors seize yachts, luxury cars from man accused of running Cambodia cyberscams
item.description: Prosecutors in Taiwan, Hong Kong and Singapore seized hundreds of millions of dollars in assets belonging to a Cambodian businessman whom the U.S. acc...

item.title: How an enduring debate over healthcare sparked a now record-long shutdown
item.description: At the heart of the impasse is a debate about expiring subsidies for health insurance. It's the latest chapter in a fight over Obamacare that has domi...

item.title: 5 takeaways from the 2025 elections. And, the shutdown now the longest in U.S. history
item.description: The 2025 elections were good to Democrats with wins in several major races, including governor's races in two states. And, the ongoing government shut...

item.title: Greetings from Johannesburg, South Africa, where spring bursts with jacaranda blooms
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Trump pushes Senate GOP to scrap filibuster to end government shutdown
item.description: President Trump told GOP senators that "we must get the government back open soon and really immediately" on Day 36 of the shutdown. Follow live updat...

item.title: 'Mandate for change': Zohran Mamdani wins New York City mayoral election
item.description: It is a historic moment as Mamdani also becomes the first South Asian and first Muslim to lead the city.

item.title: Trump U-turns to renominate billionaire for Nasa chief
item.description: Jared Isaacman's initial nomination was withdrawn by the president in May during his high-profile feud with Elon Musk.

item.title: Nurse gets life sentence for killing 10 patients in Germany
item.description: The court was told the nurse used morphine and midazolam, a muscle relaxant sometimes used for executions in the U.S.

item.title: 'One of us': Ugandan pride in New York mayor with roots in their country
item.description: A professor describes Mamdani as "one of us" while some young Ugandans take inspiration from the 34-year-old's victory.

item.title: Supreme Court weighing if Trump can unilaterally impose tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court is hearing arguments on Wednesday over President Trump's sweeping tariff policies. CBS News legal contributor Jessica Levinson has m...

item.title: Two critically injured after driver rams into people on French island
item.description: A man in his early 30s drove deliberately into people on the Ile d'Oléron off the French coast, a local mayor says.

item.title: Federal agents detain teacher at Roscoe Village daycare, preschool
item.description: A video taken by a bystander captured two federal agents detaining a woman inside a Roscoe Village day care Wednesday morning.

item.title: At least nine people killed after UPS cargo plane crashes in Kentucky
item.description: Others were injured when the plane exploded during takeoff near Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport.

item.title: UPS plane crashes and explodes at a Kentucky airport, leaving at least 9 dead and others missing
Listen Live: Supreme Court hears arguments over Trump's tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court is hearing arguments over whether a federal emergency powers law authorizes President Trump's most sweeping tariffs.

item.title: Democrats dominate as economic woes take a toll on Trump’s GOP, and other Election Day 2025 takeaways
item.description: Democrats are dominating the first major Election Day since President Donald Trump returned to the White House.

item.title: What to know about the deadly UPS plane crash in Louisville, Kentucky
